name: Cercle
slogan: We build products in the sustainability space
description:
Cercle are looking for problem-solvers who share our values and want to build sustainable solutions together, that have a positive impact. We're not looking to build a hyper-growth company. We want to enjoy working together with smart colleagues on interesting problems.

If you're a huge Amos Tversky and Daniel Kahneman fan, have a burning desire to have a positive impact and a lot of interests, we might be made for each other.

team.name: Mary Lin
team.bioHtml: Competent self-starter driven by a love of learning, problem-solving and desire to have a positive impact. @join_ef, @ImperialCollege alum

jobs.title: Co-founder - Product designer (UI/UX)
jobs.description:
Cercle are looking for problem-solvers who share our values and want to build sustainable solutions together, that have a positive impact. We're not looking to build a hyper-growth company. We want to enjoy working together with smart colleagues on interesting problems.

If you've always wanted a partnership like Amos Tversky and Danny Kahneman fan, have a burning desire to have a positive impact and a lot of interests, we want to know you.

About the role -------
Cercle is looking for a talented Product Designer who is passionate about building products that make a difference. 

What you'll be doing -------
• Taking designs from conception to implementation.
• Work closely with the founder to define, design and iterate on product features across web and mobile platforms.
• Shape product strategy and vision together with the founder.
• Talking to users and understanding their motivations.
• Building high-fidelity prototypes and working closely with the founder to shape (potentially) multiple products.

You ---------
• Analytical, with a deep interest in human behaviour and incentives.
• Keen problem solver - you enjoy thinking through complex product challenges and care about solving the right problem.
• Comfortable with ambiguity.
• Have a well trained eye for great visual design execution. You care about getting things right - one pixel off is a big deal.
• Exceptional communication skills, the ability to clearly explain your thinking and design decisions.
• Good sense of humour.

jobs.title: Co-founder / CTO
jobs.description:
Cercle are looking for problem-solvers who share our values and want to build sustainable solutions together, that have a positive impact. We're not looking to build a hyper-growth company. We want to enjoy working together with smart colleagues on interesting problems.

If you're a huge Amos Tversky and Daniel Kahneman fan, have a burning desire to have a positive impact and a lot of interests, we might be made for each other.

About the role -------
Cercle is looking for a talented Full-stack (or Front-end) Software Engineer to come on as a co-founder/CTO, to help us build products that users love, that also have a positive impact on the planet. If building things from scratch makes you happy and you have a burning desire to solve impactful problems, we want to meet you.

What you'll be doing -------
- Give your input on multiple products, working closely with the other members of the team. 
- Building the website, from design mock-ups.

This is a great opportunity to work alongside the founder, being exposed to all facets of the business growth process.

Must have -------
- Examples of past projects e.g. on GitHub
- Good communication skills.
- The ability to quickly grasp concepts.
- A can-do attitude to problem-solving.
- Desire to have a positive impact and take ownership.

Plus
- full-stack
- startup experience
- founder experience

Plus

  • startup experience
  • founder experience

jobs.title: Co-founder / CMO - content creator, relationship manager
jobs.description:
Cercle are looking for problem-solvers who share our values and want to build sustainable solutions together, that have a positive impact. We're not looking to build a hyper-growth company. We want to enjoy working together with smart colleagues on interesting problems.

If you're a huge Amos Tversky and Daniel Kahneman fan, have a burning desire to have a positive impact and a lot of interests, we might be made for each other.

About the role -------
Cercle is looking for someone who can craft beautiful stories that people want to read. If you crave the chance to make a difference with your writing, we’d like to meet you.

What you'll be doing -------
- Being the voice of the company by managing our social media (Twitter and Instagram)
- Writing blog posts on Medium about sustainability, zero-waste, social entrepreneurship.

This is a great opportunity to work alongside the founder, being exposed to all facets of the business growth process.

Must have -------
- Excellent communicator.
- Long-form writing samples.
- Experience creating content in a previous role.
- Demonstrated experience shaping content strategy. (social media strategy included)
- Desire to solve impactful problems.

Plus -------
- Experience building a social media following.
